activities.name: Find API Access Key KV Secret
activities.description: Fetch the Value of the Secret "kv-secret-for-weather-api-access-key" from the Azure Key Vault resource “KV-Oindrila-2022-March”

activities.name: Find Weather Info of City
activities.description: Access the REST API BASE URL "http://api.weatherstack.com/current/", and, pass "City Name" and the "Access Key" as "Query String", appended to the BASE URL, separated by a "Question Mark", i.e., "?".

dependsOn.activity: Find API Access Key KV Secret

url.value: @concat('http://api.weatherstack.com/current?access_key=', activity('Find API Access Key KV Secret').output.value, '&query=', pipeline().parameters.param_cityName)
